alert.note: Alert for Bell; Falls; Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:41PM CDT until September 24 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Milam County in central Texas... Eastern Bell County in central Texas... Southwestern Falls County in central Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Troy, or near Temple, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Temple, Belton, Cameron, Morgan`s Point Resort, Bartlett, Little River-Academy, Troy, Rosebud, Rogers, Holland, Lott, Golinda, Buckholts, Belton Lake, Sparks, Chilton, Wilson, White Hall, Yarrelton, and Silver City. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 293 and 313. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
